The Facebook post by ForAmerica: a right-wing political organization, claiming that the men arrested for plotting to kidnap the Michigan governor were ANTIFA and BLM anarchists.
Testimony from FBI agent Richard Trask: stating that the men were angry about Covid-19 lockdown measures and discussed "taking a sitting governor," specifically mentioning Michigan.
The involvement of the recently: formed local Wolverine Watchmen armed extremist group, with some members participating in rallies against Governor Whitmer's coronavirus restrictions.
Confirmation from the Michigan attorney: s office spokesman that none of the defendants are members of Black Lives Matter or Antifa.
